title: Zettai x Roman
sinopse:
1. Taiiku Souko Roman (The P.E. Storage Room Romance)
2. One Room Roman (One Room Romance)
3. Song Song Roman (Song Song Romance)
4. Aijou Monogatari: Akari no Baai (Love Story)
5. Sekai ni Hitotsu dake no Adabana (The One Fruitless Flower in the World)
   6-7. Tsuitemasu yo. (I'm With You.)
